data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Arriaga-Jiménez, A., Moctezuma, V., Rossini, M., Zunino, M., Halffter, G. (2016): A new species of Onthophagus (Scarabaeoidea: Scarabaeinae) from the Mexican Transition Zone, with remarks on its relationships and distribution. Zootaxa 4072 (1): 135-143, DOI: http://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4072.1.7
